quoteText: From time to time, we may change these Terms and Conditions (“The Terms”). If we change these Terms, we will inform you by posting the revised Terms on the Site. When visiting the Site, we encourage you to make sure you have read the most recent version of these Terms.
title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.

tosdr.case: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
